name: Last Life (PriestleyCGD)
description:
Last Life was created by one of our 2nd year Game Design students as part of their Final Major Project. It was completed in June 2018 and took 4 months to develop. The game is a prototype and has some bugs but is completely playable and was successful in completing the brief. Dom took on the role of Designers artist and programmer creating all of the work from scratch.

Last Life is fast paced two player and single play puzzle game.

All aspect of the game was created by the student as part of their coursework for Level 3 Game Design at Priestley College Warrington UK.

A controller is needed for this game

#level3notdegree
